Rental-Icon

The Icon Font for the rental industry

Download
  • View on GitHub

  • Follow @rentalicon
  • Star
  • Fork

The Rental-Icon font

20 Icons and growing

The Rental-Icon is growing into a set of icons specific to the rental industry. The icon provides an overview of room facilities, sports, events and rental company icons.

Time saver

The Rental-Icon is filling up a void. Designers and developers are uing a myriad of PNG images with custom icons. The Rental-Icon font can be styled with whatever CSS you can come up with.

Play well with others?

Yes it does. We are not trying to compete with the massive and wonderful Font-Awesome. You can use both next to each other.

All the icons!

Get Started

Setting up Rental-Icon can be as simple as adding two lines of code to your website!

  • Download and copy the entire rental-icons directory into your project.
  • In the <head> of your html, reference the location to your rental-icon.min.css. 
    
    <link rel="stylesheet" 
        href="path/to/rental-icon/css/rental-icon.min.css">

How to give credit

  • Websites: please provide a link back to this page on a linked page inside your website with the following code: 
    
    <a href="http://astuanax.github.io/rental-icon/">
        Rental-Icon
    </a> created by 
    <a href="https//twitter.com/astuanax">
        Astuanax
    </a>
  • Desktop usage: please provide a text file containing the same code as for the websites.

    • Contact

    I hope you find this Rental-Icon font useful.
    Feel free to get in touch if you have any questions or suggestions.
